price: 1. Ammaan (oo idil) iyo mahad waxaa mudan Allaah ee ku soo dejiyey Kitaabka (Qur’aanka) addoonkiisa(Nabi Muxammad) oo aan u yeelin wax qallooc ah2.
arabic: ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنزَلَ عَلَىٰ عَبۡدِهِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَلَمۡ يَجۡعَل لَّهُۥ عِوَجَاۜ
footnotes:
1. Nabigu s.c.w. wuxuu yidhi: “Qofkii xifdiya tobanka Aayadood ee hore ee Suuradda Al-Kahaf, waa laga dhowraa Masiix Ad-Dajjaal”. W.w. Muslim 
2. Waa kitaab toosan Qur’aanka oo qofkii raacaa uusan lahaaneyn qallooc iyo leexleexasho.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: al-ḥamdu lillahi alladhī anzala ʿalā ʿabdihi al-kitāba walam yajʿal lahu ʿiwajā
